topics.body:
"@Clover the Clever":/meta/report-site-bugs-here/post/54f717916368725ffa2b0000#post_54f717916368725ffa2b0000
[bq="Clover the Clever"]So I've made some more changes to topic loading which should ensure that the most recent post is always correct. We'll see how it goes. What we're really doing here is working around a performance regression in our database server - it may be that once it's fixed we can go back to the old, more correct/less convoluted approach.[/bq]
Here's hoping...
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@Clover the Clever":/meta/report-site-bugs-here/post/54f7288763687227c4010000#post_54f7288763687227c4010000
[bq="Clover the Clever"]And now that ought to be fixed.

(Remember kids - there are only two hard problems in computer science: cache invalidation, naming projects and off-by-one errors. We regularly deal with all two.)[/bq]
Thank you based admin

(I think this is how the whole "based" thing works anyways)
